pkgmetadata.longdescription: sklearn forest ci=================`forest-confidence-interval` is a Python module for calculating variance andadding confidence intervals to scikit-learn random forest regression orclassification objects. The core functions calculate an in-bag and error barsfor random forest objectsPlease read the repository README_ on Github or our documentation_.. _README: https://github.com/scikit-learn-contrib/forest-confidence-interval/blob/master/README.md.. _documentation: http://contrib.scikit-learn.org/forest-confidence-interval/
